text.change_billing_details_next_cycle_note: Change in the billing details will apply from the next billing cycle
text.users_per_session: {{users}} users per session / {{lite_users}} Lite users max
text.tt_public_room: People can meet in rooms in VR or on desktop for sessions inside ENGAGE. They can run meetings, lessons and experiences with people across the world. Public means anyone can join.
text.tt_private_room: People can meet in rooms in VR or on desktop for sessions inside ENGAGE. They can run meetings, lessons and experiences with people across the world. Private rooms are not listed publicly. People must have the Room ID to join them.
text.tt_password_protected: The ability to add a password to a room session, for that extra level of security and privacy.
text.tt_ifx_library: The Immersive Effects (IFX) library contains a collection of items which people can add to their meetings, lessons, experiences, and recordings. Examples include 3D models, 3D effects, sounds, music, video screens, and many more.
text.tt_locations_library: The Locations Library is a collection of rooms and locations which people can use to host their meetings, lessons or experiences. Examples include lecture halls, meeting rooms, the planet Mars, and many more.
text.tt_avatar_photo_face_generator: ENGAGE can generate a 3D model of a personâs head from an uploaded photo, which can then be used as the head of an Avatar inside ENGAGE.
text.tt_avatar_create: People are represented by avatars inside ENGAGE. It is possible to create and customize your own avatar. There are many options to choose from and you can save more than one.
text.tt_recording: Recording every detail of your meeting or lesson in full 360 degrees from every angle, not just the fixed camera. Replay that experience and walk around it, or away from the camera point, viewing it from any angle, up close or far away. Play several recordings simultaneously in the same virtual location. These recordings can be added to your meetings, lessons, experiences and even other recordings.
text.tt_website_streaming: People can display webpages on big screens inside virtual locations inside ENGAGE. This is useful for sharing information with other people in meetings and lessons. Streamed website content can even be recorded by the recording feature and played back later inside ENGAGE as part of new meetings, lessons, experiences and even as part of new recordings!
text.tt_desktop_share: People can share their desktop monitor view on a big screen inside virtual locations in ENGAGE. This is useful for sharing information with other people in meetings and lessons. Streamed desktop footage can even be recorded by the recording feature and played back later inside ENGAGE as part of new meetings, lessons, experiences and even as part of new recordings!
text.tt_snapshots: This feature makes it faster to create entertaining lessons, meetings and experiences. Simply place lots of IFX in a room, save it as an IFX Snapshot, then load it into your meeting or lesson, as many times as you like!
text.tt_assistants: When running a meeting, lesson or experience in a virtual location inside ENGAGE, it is possible to give people control to help with playing videos and web media and to record the event.
text.tt_selective_form_delivery: This feature allows people to deliver specific forms such as quizzes or feedback forms to selected people inside a session.
text.tt_early_access: The team is frequently updating ENGAGE with the latest and greatest features. PLUS account holders will get to try these before anyone else and help us shape the future of ENGAGE!
text.tt_create_events: People can create events and schedule meetings to happen inside ENGAGE.
text.tt_session_settings_controls: During a VR session, PLUS users can change settings and use advanced controls. For example, add other users as hosts, change permissions, lock users to seats, remove and ban other users, allow media control.
text.tt_sell_live_training: ENGAGE provides a comprehensive platform to host live virtual reality training, classes and experiences. This option is reserved for ENTERPRISE subscribers.
text.tt_sell_recorded_training: ENGAGE provides a comprehensive platform to create and record virtual reality training, classes and experiences. This is available for both PLUS and ENTERPRISE subscribers. Contact us to find out more about publishing terms.
text.tt_public_session: People can meet in sessions in VR or on desktop inside ENGAGE. They can run meetings, lessons and experiences with people across the world. Public means anyone can join.
text.tt_private_session: People can meet in sessions in VR or on desktop inside ENGAGE. They can run meetings, lessons and experiences with people across the world. Private sessions are not listed publicly. People must have the Session ID to join them.
text.tt_private_group_content: Create and manage private groups within an ENTERPRISE account to share lessons and other private content within ENGAGE. Very useful for corporations or education institutions who have training and lessons which they would like to share only with their employees or students.
text.tt_hosts_per_session: Inside a session in ENGAGE, there is always one Host user who has control over the session and manages the other users settings and permissions. PLUS and ENTERPRISE customers can have multiple hosts or co-hosts inside a session.
text.tt_engage_editor_access:
The Content Creator is an advanced tool for users who wish to create lessons, experiences and training in VR.
Users can create a timeline of events with IFX, presentations, characters, videos and buttons to trigger sequences.
This tool is easy to use and empowers users to create content without the need to program. Users can create VR experiences within minutes to share with other users across the world.
text.tt_special_events_license_access: PLUS and ENTERPRISE customers can host events with more than 50 people. To access this feature, please contact us directly to obtain a license.
text.tt_cloud_content_sharing: PLUS and ENTERPRISE customers have the ability to upload and share content via the ENGAGE file sharing system. Content includes items such as recordings, lessons, activities, experiences, IFX and locations. This content can be shared with other users attending their sessions and within ENTERPRISE Groups.
text.tt_upload_3d_models:
PLUS and ENTERPRISE customers can request to upload IFX such as 3D models, animated items, SFX, audio files to their account. ENTERPRISE users can store and share these privately within their own ENTERPRISE group. These can then be used in sessions inside ENGAGE.
Requests for custom uploads are dependent on the account size and are approved on a case by case basis.
text.tt_custom_environment_uploads:
ENTERPRISE customers can request to upload custom locations to be used inside ENGAGE. These can be added to the ENTERPRISE Group for use within the organization. On request, it is also possible to make these locations public. These custom locations can be used for meetings, training and events, just like all other locations.
Requests for custom uploads are dependent on the account size and are approved on a case by case basis.
ENTERPRISE clients can also hire the ENGAGE team to build custom location for an extra cost, quoted on a case by case basis.
text.tt_custom_content_menu: ENTERPRISE customers have options on which content they wish to display inside ENGAGE. For example, it is possible to hide the public tab, and to exclusively display content such as training, experiences and lessons selected by the ENTERPRISE customer.
text.tt_custom_branding: ENTERPRISE customers can customize certain parts of the ENGAGE interface and content. They can add a logo to some of the menus and splash screen, and upload custom decals for use on the clothing of their Avatars in VR.
text.tt_custom_hosting_options: There are a variety of custom hosting options available, so that ENGAGE can be delivered with high speed and excellent service within the global region of the customer. Contact the team to find out what options are available.
text.sell_live_training_enterprise: Yes, with revenue share deal for public facing content. Free to access for users within the ENTERPRISE Group.
text.sell_recorded_training_enterprise: Yes, with revenue share deal for public facing content. Free to access for users within the ENTERPRISE Group.
text.engage_editor_access_lite: Restricted access - by special request only
text.special_events_license_access_pro: Yes - Hold events with more than 50 people. Requires you to contact us with event details to acquire license.
text.special_events_license_access_enterprise: Yes - Hold events with more than 50 people. Requires you to contact us with event details to acquire license.
text.cloud_content_sharing_enterprise: Yes - Share recordings and content via ENGAGE web services
text.upload_3d_models_pro: By Request. Additional fees may apply.
text.dependant_on_enterprise_size: Yes - Amount dependent on ENTERPRISE account size
text.custom_content_menu_enterprise: Yes - Pick and choose the content you wish to display to your users
text.price_taxes_note: Price excludes taxes. View and enter tax information on next screen.
text.free_trial_duration_note_1:
Your 1 month free trial will begin on {{date_trial_start}} and will end on {{date_trial_end}}.
You can cancel the subscription anytime before {{date_trial_end}} and no payment will be charged.
text.free_trial_duration_note_2: 1 month free trial starts today and ends on {{date_trial_ends}}.
text.free_trial_note_2: Starting {{date_trial_ends}}, you will be charged {{chargeText}} until canceled.
text.free_trial_note_3: Cancel anytime before {{date_trial_ends}} and no payment will be charged.
text.free_trial_note_4: You will not be charged until your free trial ends. We ask for your billing preferences and payment information to provide a seamless subscription experience. You can cancel at any time before {{trial_end_date}}. We will also send you a reminder {{num_days}} days before your free trial ends.
text.restart_the_app:
Restart the ENGAGE app on your desktop to access your new
PLUS account and all the new features and content!
text.active_subscription_already: You already have an active subscription.
text.vat_modal_body: We were unable to validate your VAT number. A VAT number needs to match the formatting for that country. See the required VAT number formatting here.

label.summary_lite: Basic version of the software to try out features and some demo content only.
label.summary_pro: For independent professionals seeking to host live VR sessions & events with small groups and create recorded training and experiences.
label.summary_enterprise: For organizations and education institutes seeking to host sessions & events with large groups for remote work, training and experiences.
label.note_lite: Lite Users have very limited access to sessions and recorded content.
label.note_pro: This option is eligible for individuals only and is not suitable for large companies & institutions.
label.note_enterprise: This option comes with a web based administration dashboard to manage users, and a private group feature to share sessions, events and content privately with employees or students.
label.sell_live_training: Sell live training, classes and experiences
label.sell_recorded_training: Create and sell pre-recorded training, lessons and experiences

text.show_answer_after_submit_tooltip: When a person submits an answer, the correct answer is immediately displayed to them on the same screen.
text.show_correct_tooltip: After the person submits all questions, a list of the correct and incorrect answers are displayed in a summary screen at the end of the quiz or form.
text.show_feedback_after_submit_tooltip: After a person submits an answer, a custom field of text called "feedback" is then displayed. This feedback is added by the person who creates the form.
text.show_hints_incomplete_tooltip: On multiple choice questions, if a person does not add enough answers and then they press submit, then a hint text is displayed to let them know they can select more answer options.
text.submit_individually_tooltip: People must submit each question. Once submitted, it cannot be edited again.

trial-nearly-ended.thanks-vs: Thanks for subscribing to VIVE Sessions PLUS. We hope you are enjoying the experience.
trial-nearly-ended.reminder: As a reminder, your free month ends {{ends_at_date}} at {{ends_at_time}} {{timezone}}. We hope you will continue to communicate, teach and learn in virtual reality using {{url}} of ENGAGE PLUS.
trial-nearly-ended.reminder-vs: As a reminder, your free month ends {{ends_at_date}} at {{ends_at_time}} {{timezone}}. We hope you will continue to communicate, teach and learn in virtual reality using {{url}} of Vive Sessions PLUS.
trial-nearly-ended.contact: Remember, if you need support, you can always contact us at {{url}}.

reset-password.subject: Reset Password
reset-password.title: Password reset request
reset-password.requested: A password reset was recently requested for your account.
reset-password.assistance: Password changes requested through ENGAGE are only sent to the contact email on the account. If you are worried that someone is trying to gain unauthorized access to your account, go ahead and reset your password, or contact us at {{url}} for assistance.
reset-password.assistance-vs: Password changes requested through VIVE Sessions are only sent to the contact email on the account. If you are worried that someone is trying to gain unauthorized access to your account, go ahead and reset your password, or contact us at {{url}} for assistance.
reset-password.having_trouble: If you are having trouble clicking the 'Reset Password' link, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: {{url}}.

email-verification.subject-vs: Please Verify your Email Address for VIVE Sessions

email-verification.message: Please click the link below to verify your email address.
email-verification.message-vs: Please click the link below to verify your email address.
email-verification.having_trouble: If you're having trouble clicking the 'Verify your email address' button, copy and paste the URL into your web browser: {{url}}.
email-verification.contact: If you did not request this change, then please contactÂ {{support_email_address}}.

new-user.having_trouble: If you're having trouble clicking the 'Verify your email address' button, copy and paste the URL into your web browser: {{url}}.
new-user.getting_started: To get started, here is a link to some tutorial videos:

text.tagline: Create persistent sessions to meet and collaborate with your groups
text.group_tooltip:
Select a group from the list below to make the persistent session visible and accessible to users in that Enterprise group. Users will see this session in the join menu under Groups tab.
By default, a persistent session is only visible to the user who created it, and is listed under my sessions in the join menu.
text.share_copy_toaster_text: The Session ID is now copied to your clipboard to share.
text.session_create_failed: An error occurred creating session, try again later.
text.session_update_failed: An error occurred updating session, try again later.
text.session_not_available_yet: Session is not ready to join yet, try again in a moment.
text.session_delete_warning: This will delete the persistent session permanently.
text.enterprise_hosts: Enterprise Group Admin and Owner roles are granted host permissions for any persistent session by default.
text.view_group_members: View these in the group portal
text.event_link_description: This session is linked to the following event.
text.all_users_are_host_tooltip:
Co-Host has control over settings and permissions in the virtual session.
For example, Co-Host can mute microphones, change location, turn on IFX permissions for others and more.
By default, Admin and Owner roles with the Enterprise Group always have Co-Host.
It is recommended to only turn on this setting for internal persistent sessions, not those being used for large scale events.

validation.user_already_host: The user is already a host of this session
validation.user_email_does_not_exist: A user with this email does not exist
validation.user_username_does_not_exist: A user with this username does not exist
validation.no_ticket_redeemed: You need to redeem your ticket to access this event

error.room_scaling_room_cannot_be_replica: The primary session cannot be a replica
error.room_scaling_event_is_not_scalable: The session is not linked to a scalable event

text.account_verified_message: Your account is verified! Thank you!
text.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please login to continue.
text.failed_send_verification_email: Failed to send user verification email, please try again.
text.account_needs_verification:
Your account needs to be verified.
We have resent a verification link to your email account.
text.verification_link_expired: The verification link has expired. {{break}} Please ensure you are clicking on the latest verification email link.
text.verification_link_already_sent: A verification link has already been sent to your email address within the last {{minutes}} minutes.

notification.banned: The user was banned for this event successfully.
notification.removed: The user was removed from this event successfully.
notification.file_type_not_supported: The file type is not supported.
notification.attendance_success: You are attending to the event.
notification.interested_success: The interested preference was saved successfully.
notification.interested_removed: The interested preference was removed successfully.
notification.waiting_success: Request to attend the event has been sent.
notification.waiting_accepted: Guest has been moved from waiting list to attending.
notification.waiting_rejected: The attendance request was removed successfully.
notification.unbanned_success: The user was removed from the banned list successfully.
notification.join_event_not_live_error: This event has finished or is not live at the moment
notification.start_past_event_error: It is not possible to start a past event.
notification.cannot_edit_past_event: It is not possible to update a past event.
notification.session_loading: Please wait for the host to assign you to a session.

text.cancel_event_text: Once an event is canceled, it cannot be reactivated. Notifications will be sent to all guests.
text.datetime_tooltip: Users in different timezones will see date and time relevant to their detected location
text.delete_event_question: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
text.empty_attendee_list: There are no users in this list
text.guest_list_choose_title: Choose one of the guests list who will receive the emails
text.guest_list_updated: The guest list has been updated. Please refresh.
text.guest_list_tooltip_free: PLUS feature. Set the toggle to "Open" to allow anyone to join automatically once they press "attend". Setting the toggle to "Closed" means guests will have to press "Request Access". They will be placed in a waiting list, and the host will have to manually approve each guest from the events page.
text.guest_list_tooltip_pro: Set the toggle to "Open" to allow anyone to join automatically once they press "attend". Setting the toggle to "Closed" means guests will have to press "Request Access". They will be placed in a waiting list, and the host will have to manually approve each guest from the events page.
text.grace_period_tooltip: It is still possible for the host to start this event up to 1 hour after the scheduled event end time.
text.deep_link_info: If the application doesn't automatically launch see options below
text.event_guide_alert_text: View a guide to hosting events in ENGAGE
text.overbooking_warning_modal_text_1: Currently, it is a technical limitation that only 50 users can be present in a virtual reality session in ENGAGE.
text.overbooking_warning_modal_text_2: There are also commercial max limits. 50 users for ENTERPRISE accounts. 30 users for PLUS accounts.
text.overbooking_warning_modal_text_3: By setting the max registrations for your event to a number higher than the technical and commercial user capacity, some users will not be able to enter the event on the day.
text.overbooking_warning_modal_text_4: To host an event with more users, please go to
text.max_registrations_tooltip:
Max number of users who can register for the event.
This is capped at 30 for PLUS accounts and 50 for ENTERPRISE accounts.
For more information, see the events guide.
text.more_people: Want more people in your sessions
text.no_events_msg: We have no events to show on this list.
text.organizer_email_tooltip:
This email will be visible to other users who view or attend the event.
By choosing to show your email, you consent to share it with these other users.
text.password_tooltip: Add an extra level of privacy to your session with a password. You must share this password with your attendees so they can join.
text.remove_user_text: If you remove this user from the event, the user will be able to attend again.
text.rsvp_required_tooltip: If this is set to on, it means guests must RSVP to confirm their attendance.
text.session_type_tooltip_public: These sessions are listed publicly. Anyone can see and join the event.
text.session_type_tooltip_unlisted: These sessions are not listed publicly. People must be given a unique session id to join them.
text.group_event_tooltip:
Select a group to associate this event with.
Users of this group will see the event in the group tab in the events menu.
This group selection is also used to display available persistent sessions and runtime activity schedules so you can link them to this event.
text.tagline: View, create and edit events held on the platform.
text.upsell_tagline: Host or join events with people from all over the world, in VR, on Desktop and Mobile.
text.drop_file_into_box: Drag and drop an image file into the box above
text.guest_confirm_modal_top: To get access to this event you must be logged in.
text.guest_confirm_modal_bottom: If you don't have an account go to registration {{url}}.
text.validate_pro_feature_password: You do not have the right to set a password for the event.
text.validate_pro_feature_visibility_flag: You do not have the right to make this event Unlisted.
text.validate_pro_feature_guest_list_closed: You do not have the right to make Guest List closed.
text.event_starts_at_date_validation: The event start date must not be in the past.
text.event_ends_at_date_validation: Maximum event duration should not exceed {{hours}} hours.
text.event_24hr_plus_ends_at_date_validation: Maximum event duration should not exceed {{months}} months.
text.share_copy_toaster_text: The event URL is now copied to your clipboard to share.
text.request_sent_to_host: Your request has been sent to the host.
text.request_will_be_notified: You will be notified by email if the host grants your request to attend.
text.join_scalable_event_text_1: You are about to join a large scale session.
text.join_scalable_event_text_2: These are hosted across multiple virtual sessions, each containing up to 50 users.
text.scalable_event_tooltip: When this is active, an event will scale to accommodate the number of users attending. Attendees are spread across multiple cloned instances of a virtual session, each with 50 users inside. This is restricted to Enterprise subscription holders with special permission.
text.persistent_session_tooltip: A persistent session is required to run a scalable event. This feature is reserved for Enterprise subscription types. Persistent sessions are created on the Webapp. Various parameters of the event can then be customized when in VR application. For example, the host can customize the location with IFX prior to an event, and adjust the user permissions and settings.
text.runtime_tooltip: Scalable events do not require a human host to be present in every virtual session of the event. To accommodate this, hosts can setup a runtime activity schedule to manage activities such as playing pre-recorded content and changing user settings on a timed schedule.
text.edit_master_event_text_1: This persistent session is linked to:
text.edit_master_event_text_2: Settings updates will not apply to any current live sessions associated with the event.
text.end_large_scale_event_notice: The event will be ended permanently and all users will be returned to the home menu. Are you sure?
text.vive_event_tooltip: Toggle this on if you are organizing a VIVE event which requires a VIVE Ticket to enter.
text.vive_event_id_tooltip: Add the event ID from the VIVE event being organized.
text.vive_landing_tooltip: Paste the URL of the website where users can buy tickets to the VIVE event. This will appear on the banner for the event, showing users where to purchase tickets.
text.vive_access_to_event: To access this event, users must have a valid ticket and redemption code.
text.vive_ticket_go_to_link: To get a ticket, please go to
text.vive_event_access_granted_content: Your ticket has been verified and you now have access to this event.
text.redeem_code_expired_text: The redemption code used to access this event has expired. You will need a new code to join.
text.buy_new_redeem_code: Get a new redemption code by buying a ticket at

label.past_event_status_validation: It is not possible to update a past event.
label.in_progress_event_status_validation: It is not possible to update an event that is in progress.

validation.image_file_size_error: - The image may not be greater than 4 MB.

validation.redeem_code_required: The Redemption Code field must not be empty

File types accepted: PNG or JPG | Max file size: 3MB | Dimensions: 640x360
How to add image
nova.user_quota_help_text: The User Quota Is made up of the total of existing members, sub-groups and pending invitations.

text.title: files
text.feature_description: Manage your files on the platform.
text.no_items_found_favorites: You don't have any favorite files.
text.no_items_found_shared_by: You have not shared any files with anyone.
text.no_items_found_shared_with: Nobody has shared any files with you.
text.no_items_found_bin: You donât have any recently deleted files.
text.search_files_placeholder: Search for a file or folder
text.quota_reached_text: You have reached your {{quota}} upload quota.
text.removing_shared_file: Are you sure that you want to remove the shared file "{{name}}"?
text.removing_shared_file_note: NOTE : Only the file owners can delete the file.
text.delete_file_shared: This file is shared with other people. If you delete it, it will be deleted for all users that it's shared with.
text.delete_file_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to delete "{{name}}"?
text.delete_folder_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to delete "{{name}}"?
text.delete_folder_warning: NOTE - The folder will be permanently deleted. The files in this folder will be deleted to the bin.
text.remove_folder_warning: Everything that is currently in this folder will also be remove.
text.restore_file_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to restore this deleted file?
text.delete_file_permanently_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this file?
text.delete_file_permanently_note: NOTE - Permanently deleting a file will free up storage space, be gone forever and you won't be able to restore it.
text.message_bin_notice: Files in the recycle bin will be permanently deleted after 5 days. These files will not count as part of your total storage allowance.
text.error_restoring_item: An error occurred while restoring this item. Please try again later.
text.sharing_information: Share this file with other users.
text.tooltip_permission:
Read Only: This allows a user to read a file.
Admin: This allows a user to read, update and share a file.
Owner: This allows a user to read, delete, update and share a file.
text.error_loading_content: An error occurred while loading content. Please try again later.
text.error_preparing_download: An error occurred while preparing your download. Please try again later.
text.error_preparing_preview: An error occurred while preparing your preview. Please try again later.
text.error_updating_file: An error occurred while updating a file. Please try again later.
text.error_updating_folder: An error occurred while updating a folder. Please try again later.
text.error_folder_create: An error occurred while creating a folder. Please try again later.
text.error_deleting_item: An error occurred while deleting this item. Please try again later.
text.file_deleted_successfully: Your file has been deleted to the bin.
text.item_deleted_successfully: Your file has been deleted successfully.
text.error_moving_item: An error occurred while moving this item. Please try again later.
text.error_unsharing_item: An error occurred while unsharing this item. Please try again later.
text.error_sharing_item: An error occurred while sharing this item. Please try again later.
text.error_sharing_item_email_not_found: Invalid email address. Files can only be shared with other ENGAGE users.
text.error_updating_item: An error occurred while updating this item. Please try again later.
text.upload_will_overflow_quota_content_reaso: You have exceeded your cloud storage limit by trying to copy this file to the Cloud.
text.upload_will_overflow_quota_content_fixup: You can free up space by reviewing and deleting old files on the Cloud.
text.upload_will_overflow_quota_queries_conta: If you have any queries please contact support@engagevr.io
text.error_uploading_file: An error occurred while uploading a file. Please try again later.
text.network_error_uploading_file: There was an error with the network. Please try again.
text.file_format_not_supported: This file format is not supported.
text.message_action_not_allowed: You do not have permission to do this.
text.error_file_upload: An error occurred while uploading this file. Please try again later.
